scripts.docs:full: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:analyze
scripts.analyze:deps: madge --image docs/dependency-graph.svg src/ --exclude node_modules || echo 'Install madge: npm install -D madge'
scripts.analyze:unused: ts-unused-exports tsconfig.json --showLineNumber > docs/unused-exports.txt || echo 'Install ts-unused-exports: npm install -D ts-unused-exports'
